titleStmt.title: The olde bride, or The gilded beauty To a dainty new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Thomas Lambert, at the sign of the Hors-shoe in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; woodcut illustration at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Hors-shoe in Smithfield
